alert.note: Alert for Geary; Morris; Riley; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 9:14PM CDT until May 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Geary County in east central Kansas... Southern Riley County in northeastern Kansas... Northern Morris County in east central Kansas... Wabaunsee County in east central Kansas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 914 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Alma, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Junction City, Alma, Eskridge, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, Maple Hill, White City, Alta Vista, Dwight, McFarland, Harveyville, Paxico, Parkerville, Keene, Volland and Milford Lake. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 293 and 345. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
